products.title: Bella Blackout Snow White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blockout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This brilliant snow white vertical blind creates a light and airy look, so will look great in any room and is also made from blackout fabric; to help blockout the light when desired. Product id: sdb-vtb1563 fabric colour: snow white material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes bella blackout snow white 89mm vertical blind in white.

products.title: Bella Blackout Ivory Off-white 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Bella is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. products.title: Bella Blackout Paper White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This paper white vertical blind adds a light splash of white and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Frost White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. Loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This white vertical blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories.

products.title: Bella Frost (Blackout)
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
